org.jgrapes.portal.events

Interface RenderPortletFromProvider.ContentProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    RenderPortletFromProvider

    public static interface RenderPortletFromProvider.ContentProvider

    Implemented by content providers. The only requirement for content providers is that they can stream the HTML that defines the portlet view.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void writeTo(Writer out)
      Writes the content to the goven stream.

      • writeTo

        Writes the content to the goven stream.

        Parameters:
        out - the (character based) output stream
        Throws:
        IOException
